steps.description: Expose the planner's List functionality as a new 'list_plans' action in the existing `manage_plan` tool in `tool_planner.go`. This will involve modifying the `ManagePlanAction` enum (or equivalent) and updating the main switch statement in the tool's implementation to handle the new action.
acceptance: `tool_planner.go` has a new `list_plans` case in its main tool logic.
The results from `planner.List()` are returned in the tool output.
The tool definition (`available_tools`) is updated to reflect the new action if necessary.
